Package net.demilich.metastone.game.cards

Enum CardType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CardType>
      • net.demilich.metastone.game.cards.CardType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CardType>
    public enum CardType
extends java.lang.Enum<CardType>
    The different types of cards.

    CHOOSE_ONE refers to choose one spells and hero powers, not choose one minions (which are still just MINION cards.)

    See Also:
    for more about how the card type is used to affect the way a card is played.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      CHOOSE_ONE
      A choose one card is a spell card that can assume the identity of two others.
      ENCHANTMENT
      An enchantment card stores data used by effects like AddDeathrattleSpell and AddEnchantmentSpell, copying the values from it to the target.
      GROUP
      A group card represents multiple cards that are referenced together, like the CastFromGroupSpell mechanic.
      HERO
      A hero card can represent both the base heroes that are set at the beginning of the game and a playable hero card from the hand.
      HERO_POWER
      A hero power behaves like a spell card that is permanently in your hand.
      MINION
      A minion card summons a minion onto the battlefield.
      SPELL
      A spell card puts the text on the card into play as a one-time effect.
      WEAPON
      A weapon puts an Actor called a Weapon into play, which gives the Hero that weapon and its attack.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • HERO

        public static final CardType HERO
        A hero card can represent both the base heroes that are set at the beginning of the game and a playable hero card from the hand.

      • MINION

        public static final CardType MINION
        A minion card summons a minion onto the battlefield.

      • SPELL

        public static final CardType SPELL
        A spell card puts the text on the card into play as a one-time effect.

      • WEAPON

        public static final CardType WEAPON
        A weapon puts an Actor called a Weapon into play, which gives the Hero that weapon and its attack.

      • HERO_POWER

        public static final CardType HERO_POWER
        A hero power behaves like a spell card that is permanently in your hand. It can only be used once per turn.

      • GROUP

        public static final CardType GROUP
        A group card represents multiple cards that are referenced together, like the CastFromGroupSpell mechanic.

      • CHOOSE_ONE

        public static final CardType CHOOSE_ONE
        A choose one card is a spell card that can assume the identity of two others. The base choose one card is put into your graveyard and returned to your hand by return hand effects. The chosen card is cast, and therefore is the card that interacts with spell casting effects and triggers.

      • ENCHANTMENT

        public static final CardType ENCHANTMENT
        An enchantment card stores data used by effects like AddDeathrattleSpell and AddEnchantmentSpell, copying the values from it to the target.

      • valueOf

        public static CardType valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:

      • isCardType

        public boolean isCardType​(CardType cardType)
        Indicates whether or not the instance is of the specified card type.

        Use this instead of direct comparisons to interpret a CHOOSE_ONE card as a SPELL card.

        Parameters:
        cardType - The card type to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if this instance is of the cardType.
